LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedSugar.stages.0.label: consumed sugar
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedSugar.stages.0.description: Sugar is not love. But it can feel like it.
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedInsectJelly.stages.0.label: consumed insect jelly preserves
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedInsectJelly.stages.0.descrip: What an incredibly sweet and rich taste!
LanguageData.VCE_SmokeleafButterHigh.stages.0.label: high on smokeleaf butter
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedSalt.stages.0.label: consumed salt
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedSalt.stages.0.description: A pinch of salt really enhances the flavours of a meal.
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedMayo.stages.0.label: consumed mayo
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedMayo.stages.0.description: I ate some delicious mayo. Very filling!
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedAgave.stages.0.label: consumed agave
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedAgave.stages.0.description: I ate some delicious agave nectar.
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedSpices.stages.0.label: consumed spices
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetMeal.stages.0.label: ate gourmet meal
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetMeal.stages.0.description: A mindbending culinary experience. My palate has been gifted with sensations that are beyond this world.
LanguageData.VCE_AteSimpleDessert.stages.0.label: ate simple dessert
LanguageData.VCE_AteSimpleDessert.stages.0.descriptio: That dessert was very simple, but certainly tasty.
LanguageData.VCE_AteFineDessert.stages.0.label: ate fine dessert
LanguageData.VCE_AteFineDessert.stages.0.description: That dessert was really good! I want more!
LanguageData.VCE_AteLavishDessert.stages.0.label: ate lavish dessert
LanguageData.VCE_AteLavishDessert.stages.0.descriptio: That dessert was unbelievably good, I'm so eager to eat more of it!
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetDessert.stages.0.label: ate gourmet dessert
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetDessert.stages.0.descripti: Oh my God! My palate had never experienced such an explosion of orgasmic tastes. That was pure food porn. I need more!
LanguageData.VCE_AteSimpleGrill.stages.0.label: ate simple grill
LanguageData.VCE_AteFineGrill.stages.0.label: ate fine grill
LanguageData.VCE_AteFineGrill.stages.0.description: I ate a very fine grilled meat with some vegetables. Super tasty.
LanguageData.VCE_AteLavishGrill.stages.0.label: ate lavish grill
LanguageData.VCE_AteLavishGrill.stages.0.description: I ate an incredible dish with expertly cooked grilled meat and some veggies. Delicious!
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetGrill.stages.0.label: ate gourmet grill
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetGrill.stages.0.description: That... that was out of this world. The meat melted in my mouth. Just incredible.
LanguageData.VCE_AteFriedGoods.stages.0.label: ate deep fried food
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedCannedGoods.stages.0.label: ate canned food
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedCannedGoods.stages.0.descrip: Eating directly from a can is like eating without a table.
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.0.label: ate awful cheese
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.0.description: I ate some poorly curdled milk with barely any cheese flavour. Disgusting.
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.1.label: ate poor cheese
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.1.description: That cheese wasn't horrible but wasn't great either. The aftertaste was kinda icky.
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.2.label: ate normal cheese
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.3.label: ate good cheese
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.3.description: I ate some fine cheese. Delicious.
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.4.label: ate excellent cheese
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.4.description: I ate some fine cheese. You can tell when it has had a good amount of time to mature.
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.5.label: ate masterwork cheese
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.5.description: That cheese was simply amazing! It doesn't get much better than this.
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.6.label: ate legendary cheese
LanguageData.VCE_AteCheese.stages.6.description: I've eaten quite possibly some of the best cheese I've ever tasted!
